pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gorg serves as a back-end XSLT processor for an XML-based web site. Gorg was developed with http://www.gentoo.org in mind and it allows you to serve your own local copy of http://www.gentoo.org. It can use either a cgi or a fastcgi script with apache, or even use its own stand-alone web server. Its name is short for Gentoo.org.
